scripts.db:deploy: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' yarn workspace @lilicas/db knex migrate:latest --env main
scripts.db:migrate:redo: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' yarn workspace @lilicas/db knex migrate:down --env main && NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' yarn workspace @lilicas/db knex migrate:up --env main
scripts.dev: yarn compose:dev && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n api,bot,web "yarn workspace @lilicas/api dev" "yarn workspace @lilicas/bot dev" "yarn workspace @lilicas/web dev"
